entities.description: Indicates whether the respondent has ever used any tobacco products or nicotine vaping.
Indicates whether the respondent has used any tobacco products or nicotine vaping in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent has used any tobacco products or nicotine vaping in the past month.
Details the extent of nicotine vaping and tobacco products use in the past month.
Details the extent of combined nicotine vaping and cig/nontobacco product use in the past month.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever used alcohol.
Indicates whether the respondent has used alcohol in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent has used alcohol in the past month.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever used CBD or hemp products.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to their experience with ever using tobacco products or nicotine vaping.
Relates the respondent to their experience with tobacco products or nicotine vaping in the past year.
Relates the respondent to their experience with tobacco products or nicotine vaping in the past month.
Relates the respondent to the specifics of their nicotine vaping and tobacco use in the past month.
Relates the respondent to the specifics of their combined nicotine vaping and other product use in the past month.
Relates the respondent to their experience with ever using alcohol.
Relates the respondent to their experience with alcohol use in the past year.
Relates the respondent to their experience with alcohol use in the past month.
Relates the respondent to their experience with ever using CBD or hemp products.
